description: Motorists are being urged to avoid the area while emergency crews work.
title: Peterborough city centre roads closed after fire in Broadway
title_page: Peterborough city centre roads closed after fire in Broadway - BBC News
maintext:
Parts of a city centre have been cordoned off while firefighters respond to an incident.
Cambridgeshire Police said officers were also at the scene in Broadway, Peterborough, on Monday morning, following reports of a fire.
The force added that the Eastfield Road junctions with Crawthorne Road, Broadway, Monument Street and Burghley Square had been closed.
